# Encoder definitions for film/movie saving

# mencoder test definition
Name 'OLD mencoder / mp4'
Nickname 'menc-mp4'
# -- First pass
CommandName 'First Pass'
Command mencoder
CommandSearchPaths /usr/bin,/usr/local/bin
CommandArguments '-ovc lavc -lavcopts vcodec=msmpeg4v2:vpass=1:vbitrate=2343750:mbd=2:keyint=132:vqblur=1.0:cmp=2:subcmp=2:dia=2:o=mpv_flags=+mv0:last_pred=3 -mf type=png:fps=FRAMESPERSECOND -nosound -o /dev/null mf://FRAMESFILE'
# -- Second pass
CommandName 'Second Pass'
Command mencoder
CommandSearchPaths /usr/bin,/usr/local/bin
CommandArguments '-ovc lavc -lavcopts vcodec=msmpeg4v2:vpass=2:vbitrate=2343750:mbd=2:keyint=132:vqblur=1.0:cmp=2:subcmp=2:dia=2:o=mpv_flags=+mv0:last_pred=3 -mf type=png:fps=FRAMESPERSECOND -nosound -o OUTPUTFILE mf://@FRAMESFILE'
# -- MP4 creation
CommandName 'MP4 Creation'
Command MP4Box
CommandSearchPaths /usr/bin,/usr/local/bin
CommandArguments '-f OUTPUTFILE -s FRAMESFILE second pass'
